text: Geodia arripiens is a species of sponge in the family Geodiidae. It is found in the waters of the South China Sea. The species was first described by Nils Gustaf Lindgren in 1897. ==References== == Bibliography == * Lindgren, N.G. (1897). Beitrag zur Kenntniss der Spongienfauna des Malaiischen Archipels und der Chinesischen Meere. Zoologische Anzeiger. 547: 480-487 Category:Tetractinellida Category:Sponges described in 1897
title: Geodia arripiens
